content: --अर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} that has accomplished its end or desired object, successful; रामरावणयोर्युद्धं चरितार्थमिवाभवत् <ls>R. 12. 87</ls>; चरितार्थैव भारती <ls n="R.">10. 36</ls>; <ls>Ki. 13. 62.</ls> {2} satisfied, contented. {3} effected, accomplished. {4} significant, true to its sense; <ls>Ku. 2. 17.</ls> {5} appropriate, fit; <ls>Ku. 4. 45.</ls>
